ArrivalSchedules.description: Dataclass for tracking the specimen arrival schedules of a model.

cancer.description: Arrival schedule for cancer pathway specimens.

noncancer.description: Arrival schedule for non-cancer pathway specimens.

ArrivalSchedules.title: ArrivalSchedules

BatchSizes.description:
Information for tracking batch sizes in a model.  This is the number of specimens, blocks, or slides in a machine or delivery batch.  Batches in the model are homogeneous, i.e. all items in a batch are of the same type.
The field titles in this class MUST match the rows of the Excel input file ("Batch Sizes" tab).
BatchSizes.title: BatchSizes

DistributionInfo.description: Information describing a three-point random distributions for task durations.
DistributionInfo.title: DistributionInfo

Globals.description:
Stores the global variables of a model.

Field titles should match the corresponding named range in the Excel input file and therefore should not contain any spaces or symbols.

prob_internal.description: Probability that a specimen comes from an internal source, i.e. one that uses the EPIC system.
prob_internal.title: ProbInternal

prob_urgent_cancer.description: Probability that a cancer-pathway specimen has Urgent priority.
prob_urgent_cancer.title: ProbInternal

prob_urgent_non_cancer.description: Probability that a non-cancer-pathway specimen has Urgent priority.
prob_urgent_non_cancer.title: ProbInternal

prob_priority_cancer.description: Probability that a cancer-pathway specimen has Priority priority.
prob_priority_cancer.title: ProbInternal

prob_priority_non_cancer.description: Probability that a non-cancer-pathway specimen has Priority priority.
prob_priority_non_cancer.title: ProbInternal

prob_routine_cancer.description: Probability that a cancer-pathway specimen has Routine/Cancer priority.
prob_routine_cancer.title: ProbInternal

prob_routine_non_cancer.description: Probability that a non-cancer-pathway specimen has Routine priority.
prob_routine_non_cancer.title: ProbInternal

prob_prebook.description: Probability that a specimen requires pre-booking-in investigation.
prob_prebook.title: ProbInternal

prob_invest_easy.description: Probability that an internal specimen requires booking-in investigation, and the investigation is classified as "easy".
prob_invest_easy.title: ProbInternal

prob_invest_hard.description: Probability that an internal specimen requires booking-in investigation, and the investigation is classified as "hard".
prob_invest_hard.title: ProbInternal

prob_invest_external.description: Probability that an external specimen requires booking-in investigation.
prob_invest_external.title: ProbInternal

prob_bms_cutup.description: Probability that a non-urgent specimen goes to BMS cut-up.
prob_bms_cutup.title: ProbBMSCutup

prob_bms_cutup_urgent.description: Probability that an urgent specimen goes to BMS cut-up.
prob_bms_cutup_urgent.title: ProbBMSCutup

prob_large_cutup.description: Probability that a non-urgent specimen goes to large specimens cut-up.
prob_large_cutup.title: ProbBMSCutup

prob_large_cutup_urgent.description: Probability that an urgent specimen goes to large specimens cut-up.
prob_large_cutup_urgent.title: ProbBMSCutup

prob_pool_cutup.description: Probability that a non-urgent specimen goes to Pool cut-up.
prob_pool_cutup.title: ProbBMSCutup

prob_pool_cutup_urgent.description: Probability that an urgent specimen goes to Pool cut-up.
prob_pool_cutup_urgent.title: ProbBMSCutup

prob_mega_blocks.description: Probability that a large specimen cut-up produces mega blocks. With the remaining probability, large surgical blocks are produced instead.
prob_mega_blocks.title: ProbMegaBlocks

prob_decalc_bone.description: Probability that an specimen requires decalcification at a bone station.
prob_decalc_bone.title: ProbDecalcBone

prob_decalc_oven.description: Probability that an specimen requires decalcification in a decalc oven.
prob_decalc_oven.title: ProbDecalcOven

prob_microtomy_levels.description: Probability that a small surgical block produces a "levels" microtomy task. With remaining probability, a "serials" microtomy task is produced.
prob_microtomy_levels.title: ProbMicrotomyLevels

num_blocks_large_surgical.description: Parameters for the number of large surgical blocks produced in a cut-up that produces such blocks.
num_blocks_large_surgical.title: NumBlocksLargeSurgical

num_blocks_mega.description: Parameters for the number of mega blocks produced in a cut-up that produces such blocks.
num_blocks_mega.title: NumBlocksMega

num_slides_larges.description: Parameters for the number of slides produced for a large surgical microtomy task.
num_slides_larges.title: NumSlidesLarges

num_slides_levels.description: Parameters for the number of slides produced for a levels microtomy task.
num_slides_levels.title: NumSlidesLarges

num_slides_megas.description: Parameters for the number of slides produced for a megas microtomy task.
num_slides_megas.title: NumSlidesLarges

num_slides_serials.description: Parameters for the number of slides produced for a serials microtomy task.
num_slides_serials.title: NumSlidesLarges

Globals.title: Globals

IntDistributionInfo.description: Information describing a discretised three-point random distribution.
IntDistributionInfo.title: IntDistributionInfo

day_flags.description: True/1 if resource is scheduled for the day (MON to SUN), False/0 otherwise.
day_flags.title: Day Flags

allocation.description: Number of resource units allocated for the day (in 30-min intervals), if the corresponding day flag is set to 1. The list length is expected to be 48.
allocation.title: Allocation

ResourcesInfo.description:
Dataclass for tracking the staff resources of a model.

The fields in this dataclass **MUST** match the rows of the configuration Excel template ("Resources" tab), with all letters to lowercase, spaces to underscores, and other characters removed.
ResourcesInfo.title: ResourcesInfo

TaskDurationsInfo.description:
Information for tracking task durations in a model.

The field titles in this class **MUST** match the rows of the Excel input file ("Task Durations" tab).

receive_and_sort.description: Time for reception to receive a new specimen and assign a priority value.
receive_and_sort.title: Receive and sort

pre_booking_in_investigation.description: Time to conduct a pre-booking-in investigation, if required.
pre_booking_in_investigation.title: Pre-booking-in investigation

booking_in_internal.description: Time to book in the specimen, if the specimen was received internally, i.e. it already exists on the EPIC sytem.
booking_in_internal.title: Booking-in (internal)

booking_in_external.description: Time to book in the specimen, if the specimen was received externally, i.e. a new entry must be created on EPIC.
booking_in_external.title: Booking-in (internal)

booking_in_investigation_internal_easy.description: Time to conduct a booking-in investigation for an internal specimen, if the investigation is classified as "easy".
booking_in_investigation_internal_easy.title: Booking-in investigation (internal, easy)

booking_in_investigation_internal_hard.description: Time to conduct a booking-in investigation for an internal specimen, if the investigation is classified as "hard".
booking_in_investigation_internal_hard.title: Booking-in investigation (internal, hard)

booking_in_investigation_external.description: Time to conduct a booking-in investigation for an external specimen.
booking_in_investigation_external.title: Booking-in investigation (internal, easy)

cut_up_bms.description: Time to conduct a BMS cut-up.
cut_up_bms.title: Cut-up (BMS)

cut_up_pool.description: Time to conduct a pool cut-up.
cut_up_pool.title: Cut-up (Pool)

cut_up_large_specimens.description: Time to conduct a large specimens cut-up.
cut_up_large_specimens.title: Cut-up (large specimens)

load_bone_station.description: Time to load a batch of blocks into a bone station.
load_bone_station.title: Load bone station

decalc.description: Time to decalcify a bony specimen.
decalc.title: Decalc

unload_bone_station.description: Time to unload a batch of blocks into a bone station.
unload_bone_station.title: Unload bone station

load_into_decalc_oven.description: Time to load a single block into a bone station.
load_into_decalc_oven.title: Load bone station

unload_from_decalc_oven.description: Time to unload a single block into a bone station.
unload_from_decalc_oven.title: Load bone station

load_processing_machine.description: Time to load a batch of blocks into a processing machine.
load_processing_machine.title: Load processing machine

unload_processing_machine.description: Time to unload a batch of blocks from a processing machine.
unload_processing_machine.title: Unload processing machine

processing_urgent.description: Programme length for the processing of urgent blocks.
processing_urgent.title: Processing machine (urgent)

processing_small_surgicals.description: Programme length for the processing of small surgical blocks.
processing_small_surgicals.title: Processing machine (small surgicals)

processing_large_surgicals.description: Programme length for the processing of large surgical blocks.
processing_large_surgicals.title: Processing machine (large surgicals)

processing_megas.description: Programme length for the processing of mega blocks.
processing_megas.title: Processing machine (megas)

embedding.description: Time to embed a block in paraffin wax (staffed).
embedding.title: Embedding

embedding_cooldown.description: Time for a wax block to cool (unstaffed).
embedding_cooldown.title: Embedding (cooldown)

block_trimming.description: Time to trim excess wax from the edges of a block.
block_trimming.title: Block trimming

microtomy_serials.description: Time to produce serial slides from a block.
microtomy_serials.title: Microtomy (serials)

microtomy_levels.description: Time to produce level slides from a block.
microtomy_levels.title: Microtomy (levels)

microtomy_larges.description: Time to produce large-section slides from a block. These are regular-sized slides, but with larger tissue sections.
microtomy_larges.title: Microtomy (larges)

microtomy_megas.description: Time to produce mega slides from a mega block.
microtomy_megas.title: Microtomy (mega)

load_staining_machine_regular.description: Time to load a batch of regular-sized slides into a staining machine.
load_staining_machine_regular.title: Load staining machine (regular)

load_staining_machine_megas.description: Time to load a batch of mega slides into a staining machine.
load_staining_machine_megas.title: Load staining machine (regular)

staining_regular.description: Time to stain a batch of regular slides.
staining_regular.title: Load staining machine (regular)

staining_megas.description: Time to stain a batch of mega slides.
staining_megas.title: Load staining machine (regular)

unload_staining_machine_regular.description: Time to unload a batch of regular slides from a staining machine.
unload_staining_machine_regular.title: Load staining machine (regular)

unload_staining_machine_megas.description: Time to unload a batch of mega slides from a staining machine.
unload_staining_machine_megas.title: Load staining machine (regular)

load_coverslip_machine_regular.description: Time to load a batch of regular slides into a coverslip machine.
load_coverslip_machine_regular.title: Load coverslip machine (regular)

coverslip_regular.description: Time to affix coverslips to a batch of regular slides.
coverslip_regular.title: Coverslipping (regular)

coverslip_megas.description: Time to affix a coverslip to a mega slide (manual task).
coverslip_megas.title: Load coverslip machine (regular)

unload_coverslip_machine_regular.description: Time to unload a batch of regular slides into a coverslip machine.
unload_coverslip_machine_regular.title: Load coverslip machine (regular)

load_scanning_machine_regular.description: Time to load a batch of regular slides into a scanning machine.
load_scanning_machine_regular.title: Load scanning machine (regular)

load_scanning_machine_megas.description: Time to load a batch of mega slides into a scanning machine. There are dedicated scanning machines for mega slides.
load_scanning_machine_megas.title: Load scanning machine (megas)

scanning_regular.description: Time to scan a batch of regular slides.
scanning_regular.title: Scanning (regular)

scanning_megas.description: Time to scan a batch of mega slides.
scanning_megas.title: Scanning (regular)

unload_scanning_machine_regular.description: Time to unload a batch of regular slides from a scanning machine.
unload_scanning_machine_regular.title: Unload scanning machine (regular)

unload_scanning_machine_megas.description: Time to unload a batch of mega slides from a scanning machine.
unload_scanning_machine_megas.title: Unload scanning machine (regular)

block_and_quality_check.description: Time to perform the block and quality checks for a specimen.
block_and_quality_check.title: Block and quality check

assign_histopathologist.description: Time to assign a histopathologist to a specimen.
assign_histopathologist.title: Assign histopathologist

write_report.description: Time to write the histopathological report for a specimen.
write_report.title: Write histopathological report

TaskDurationsInfo.title: TaskDurationsInfo

description: Configuration settings for the histopathlogy department model.
title: Config
